definition: to build (esp. with simple materials)/to knock together (a temporary shed)/to rig up
to put up/to build (scaffolding)/to hang (clothes on a pole)/to connect/to join/to arrange in pairs/to match/to add/to throw in (resources)/to take (boat, train)/variant of 褡[da1]
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct

sentences.english: The tower was mounted on the backs of "four well-trained elephants.
sentences.chinese: 这个塔搭建在四个训练有素的大象背上。

sentences.english: The feature in this section seems to set up a round-table conversation.
sentences.chinese: 本期的“注目”专题，更像是试图搭建一次圆桌对话。

sentences.english: Nissan to build a positive learning platform for the realization of the depth of high school co-operation.
sentences.chinese: 积极搭建产学平台，实现校企深度合作。

sentences.english: A monitoring water-wall test bed is built for validation and practical application.
sentences.chinese: 搭建了水冷壁监测实验台进行验证和实践应用研究。

sentences.english: They set up a temporary theater under a bridge with bamboo sticks.
sentences.chinese: 他们在桥底用竹竿搭建临时舞台。

sentences.english: Her nest was beautifully constructed out of bits of rubbish.
sentences.chinese: 她废物利用漂亮地搭建了巢窝。

sentences.english: They fixed up a bike shed here.
sentences.chinese: 他们在这儿搭建一个车棚。

sentences.english: Herdsmen and herdswomen are building tents with domed roofs in the site of their new home.
sentences.chinese: 牧民们正在这个新的居住地搭建穹庐呢。

sentences.english: The government is planning to build a dam here.
sentences.chinese: 当局筹算在这搭建一座防洪坝。

sentences.english: The contractor flung up some temporary sheds to hold the new equipment.
sentences.chinese: 签约人匆忙搭建工棚存放新设备。

sentences.english: Organizers will assign volunteers to teams that need assistant for stage set-up.
sentences.chinese: 主办方将为那些需要帮助舞台搭建的队伍指派志愿者。

sentences.english: Building a user-defined honeypot system can better fulfil different requirement.
sentences.chinese: 搭建自定义的蜜罐系统能够较好的满足不同的需求。

sentences.english: What does it mean from the standpoint of infrastructure building?
sentences.chinese: 从基础设施搭建的角度来看这意味这什么呢？
他搭建了一个巨大的火葬柴堆。

sentences.english: The houses were made of mud clay and straw.
sentences.chinese: 这里的房子是用稻草和粘土搭建的。

sentences.english: So let me begin with bridge building.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们先从搭建“桥梁“说起。

definition: to create/to build/to develop/to forge (of metal)
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
to draw support from/with the help of
to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)
variant of 構|构[gou4]/(Tw) (coll.) variant of 夠|够[gou4]/to reach by stretching
